About Me

I'm Vaibhav Katkar, a Computer Engineering student at Savitribai Phule Pune University, Pune — with hands-on experience that goes far beyond assignments and textbooks.

I'm the Founder of Form2Chat.me, a production SaaS platform I built end-to-end: architecture, backend APIs, Razorpay payment gateway, multi-format data export, and WhatsApp API integration — all serving real paying users. This taught me what no classroom can — the complete product lifecycle from zero to revenue.

I've competed at national hackathons hosted by Google, Blinkit, GDG, and NIT Patna, leading teams as Team Leader at multiple events. I build AI-powered tools with OpenAI and Gemini APIs, real-time systems with Socket.io, and secure, scalable backends with Node.js and MongoDB.

I'm actively seeking full-time roles, internships, or freelance projects in Full-Stack or Backend Development. If you're looking for someone who ships, not just codes — let's talk.
